overview: An animated film painted on emergency thermal safety blankets, featuring the state of emergency declarations of Trump, Macron, Putin, Merkel and many others. The harshness of the contrast between living images and dead words is everything. As in other films Ushev knows how to hit the heart and show us the pain points of contemporaneity with an extremely direct and at the same time poetic way.
title: Apocalypse Is Under The Blanket
